column5: Does anybody know if there is an app that allows you to blur your pics to hide spots?  I've tried a couple photo edit apps but they don't really do what I'm looking for... Blurs or that twisty spiral effect I see alot...
Why bother we all know where you fish!!!
I know if you upload your pics to photobucket you can edit the pics there and it will give you the effects your looking for.
I figured I could find something on my PC but was hoping for an app... Make thing easier...
I use iRetoutch. It's got the exact blur tool that you are looking for. Takes a little while to blur but it works good.
Perfect... Works exactly how I wanted it to... Iretouch  Thnx
